meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Islamic Head Scarf Ban Takes Effect in France A law banning Islamic head scarves and other religious symbols from French public schools went into effect, transforming the first day of school into a nationwide show of defiance of a demand by the captors of two French journalists in Iraq that the law be rescinded.
Malaysian Ex-Official Freed A Malaysian court overturned the sodomy conviction of former Deputy Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. He had been jailed since 1998.

Islamic Head Scarf Ban Takes Effect in France A law banning Islamic head scarves and other religious symbols from French public schools went into effect, transforming the first day of school into a nationwide show of defiance of a demand by the captors of two French journalists in Iraq that the law be rescinded.
Malaysian Ex-Official Freed A Malaysian court overturned the sodomy conviction of former Deputy Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. He had been jailed since 1998.
Feast for the Eyes Mimi Sheraton makes a meal of still-life paintings at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, linking palate and palette.

Avian Flu Among Cats The avian influenza virus that has spread among birds and some people in Asia has crossed another barrier to infect cats and can pass among them, scientists said, calling the finding ''extraordinary.''
